subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Boston Red Sox reliever Mike Timlin was placed on the 15-day disabled list because of tendinitis in his left knee. The move allowed Boston to activate the right-hander Daisuke Matsuzaka for Saturday’s game against the St. Louis Cardinals. Timlin, placed on the disabled list retroactive to June 17, is 3-3 with a 7.06 E.R.A. in 24 relief appearances this season.
